pages.text: Even though you are not the most proficient chef, even this rudimentary one tastes great! $(br2)You can garnish it with different toppings to grant you $(thing)defensive abilities$() for a short duration.

pages.title: Jaramel Tart
pages.text: The classic. The only thing that would make this one more delicious would be the tears of your enemies.
Makes you able to see & swim in Lava as if it were Water.$(br)However, does NOT make you fire immune.
Makes you able to swim at light speed and greatly increases your underwater mining rate.
Makes you feel well rested, like after a good night's sleep. Scares away creatures of nightmares.
Small chance for projectiles to simply deflect off of you.
